text: Tyo samayala'i yadagara jabaki tapa'iko palanakartale pharistaharula'i bhanirakheko thiyo â€˜â€˜ki ma timro sathama chu. Atah timile imanavalaharula'i him'mata badha'umdai gara. Ma inkara garnevalaharuko hrdayama bhaya utpanna gara'idinchu. Tasartha timi gardanama prahara gara ra unaka aunlaharuko tuppoma cota purya'u
